conbody.p: Each character set consists of text characters, which shape is defined by fonts. In addition to the TrueType font, you can use compiled SHX font in ZWCAD. One font can be used for multiple text styles as long as you make other settings different. The following illustration shows the same font used by different text styles that use different settings.
You can specify the desired font fromthe Text Font field to the current or a newly created text font in the Text Style dialog box.
